text.0: Kelly Marshall, Memory Care Coordinator at Johns Hopkins Home Care Group-Home Support loves any Thanksgiving food that fits on her plate. What is your favorite Thanksgiving food? #VirtualThanksgiving https://t.co/y7cNcwsN5O
text.1:
.@HopkinsMedicine surgeon Andrew Cameron and his team performed a life-altering liver transplant on a patient who connected with her donor via Facebook. @hopkinssurgery @WMAR2News

text.2: Congrats to our neurologists – Gregory Bergey, Rafael Llinas, Justin McArthur, Kelly Mills, Ellen Mowry, Kristin Baranano, Eric Kossoff and Lisa Sun for – receiving “Top Doctor” designation by their peers in Baltimore magazine’s November issue. https://t.co/Hsvre5N3Iw
text.3: #Diabetes can affect your body from head to toe. What can you do to prevent, manage & treat this condition? #NDAM  https://t.co/wsw2221bd4
text.4: Surgical oncologist Jonathan Greer discusses the case of a patient with colon cancer and Lynch syndrome, a genetic predisposition to different cancer types, who underwent a complex HIPEC procedure to treat the cancer.
